xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/20906-Dave Matthews Band: Live at Piedmont Park 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aHMMEtAlyjB4ZUjigvHsRGk6JaH.jpg Live at Piedmont Park is a live album and video release by the Dave Matthews Band from a 2007 benefit concert in Atlanta, Georgia. The concert was held at Atlanta's Piedmont Park in front of an audience of over 80,000 people to raise over US $1 million of a US $42.5 million project to expand 53 acres (210,000 m2) of the city's park. Dave Matthews Band: Live at Piedmont Park
